Class PowerCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.power.PowerCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
Centaur, Farmer, Friar, Harvester, Herald, Herbalist, Jester, Knight, Mailman, Minstrel, Princess, Thief
public class PowerCard extends Object
Power card represents the power characters in the expert game
